key.name: notification-enabled
key.description: Whether to show notifications for mode changes and command recognition

key.name: update-interval
key.description: How often to check for file changes (in seconds)

key.name: command-threshold
key.description: Minimum confidence percentage required to execute voice commands

key.name: processing-interval
key.description: Time in seconds to wait before processing buffered speech

key.name: hotword
key.description: The word used to activate command mode from normal mode

key.name: auto-sync
key.description: Automatically sync changes between extension and configuration file
